fields.description:
My hadoop version 3.1.0. I found thatÂ  a problem RM startup failure on recovery as the follow test step:
1.create a user "user1" have the permisson to submit app.
2.use user1 to submit a job ,wait job finished.
3.delete user "user1"
4.restart yarn 
5.the RM restart failed

RM logs:
